articles.description: Milton Packer believes advocacy of the drug is practicing politics, not medicine
articles.content:
Chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine (HCQ) have been touted as promising and effective treatments for patients with COVID-19 infection. The drugs are often recommended to be used together with azithromycin, an antibiotic.
On March 21, 2020, President Trump cla… [+10498 chars]

articles.title: Blood sugar test: When and how to do it correctly - Times of India
articles.description: For someone suffering from diabetes, keeping a track of their blood sugar level is paramount. The amount of sugar in the blood is controlled by a hormone called insulin. In a diabetic patient, their body either does not make enough insulin or the insulin prod…
articles.content:
You can do the test multiple times a day to monitor the fluctuation, but it is important to consult your doctor about the frequency. Depending on your health condition, your doctor will tell you how often you should do it. You can do it:

articles.description: Their novel nature and unpredictability make diseases that jump from animals to humans extremely dangerous
